:• '''866''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac backhaul (433Mbps per stream), :• '''866''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11n device (2.4GHz QAM-256) channel = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Orbi Whole Home WiFi System with Built-in Cable Modem}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/orbi/cbk40.aspx}} Also sold as part of the Cable Orbi Kit (CBK40) which includes :a [[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS40)]] priced at $400.
